description.name: Buck rake down cover
Safety shoes model no. 5 fly knitted S1P SRC - size 46
description.long_desc:
Sports-style safety shoes with S1P protection class and SRC (Slip Resistant Sole). Made of light, breathable fabric preventing feet from sweating. 


toecap resistant to 200J,
anti-static and anti-slip sole,
energy absorption in the heel area,
sole with an anti-puncture insert that protects the foot from being stepped on by sharp objects
more breathable than footwear class S3, what makes them suitable for closed rooms where they will not be exposed to rainwater or external elements.

description.name: Paint sprayer
description.long_desc:
GEKO spray gun is perfect for spraying residential paint, un-thinned, indoors or out. With two nozzles of different sizes and the flow control knob on the sprayer, you can easily adjust the paint output. Lightweight and compact size fit perfectly in your hand and let you spray longer without fatigue.


Technical Data



  • Voltage: 230V

  • Power Consumption: 400W

  • Container Volume: 800 ml

  • Max. Viscosity: 80 DIN-Secs

  • Paint Delivery Rate: up to 300 ml/min

  • Performance: 15m2 in 10 min

  • Nozzle Size: 1.8 mm, 2.5 mm


Package Contents:



  • Electric Spray Gun

  • 800ml Container

  • Copper Spray nozzles 1.8, 2.5 mm

  • Viscosity Cup

description.name: 1" Air Impact Wrench 4800Nm
description.long_desc:
Professional Air Impact Wrench GEKO 4800Nm. Equipped with an external trigger placed in the D-shaped handle. Air Inlet with 45 degree angle to make air pipe smoothly. GEKO wrench is dedicated to industrial work, demanding services, workshops and other applications where high power is required.


Product Features



  • High torque 4800Nm

  • Simple impact mechanism, easy to service

  • "Rocking Dog" Impact Mechanism - its main advantage is high load capacity and stability

  • Double handle to keep more stability

  • Dedicated to industrial work, demanding services, workshops and other applications where high power is required

  • Maximum socket size: 48mm


Technical Data



  • Max Torque: 4800 Nm

  • Power Regulation: 3-step tightening , 3-step loosening

  • No Load Speed: 3800 rpm

  • Air Inlet: 1/2 inch (12.7mm)

  • Square Drive: 1 inch

  • Accesories: quick connect coupling 1/2 in, hex key

description.name: 16mm Internal Bending Spring
description.long_desc:
The bending spring is a combination of innovative design and robust craftsmanship that enables smooth and precise bending of PEX-AL-PEX and PERT-AL-PERT pipes. The spring is made from manganese spring steel 65Mn (galvanized), which is characterized by high elasticity and wear resistance.


The internal bending spring is essential when carrying out hydraulic installations in the PEX-AL-PEX and PERT-AL-PERT systems. Using the spring allows for bending the pipe in any direction while preventing flattening and altering the profile of the pipe.


Product Features:



  • Spring made from manganese spring steel 65Mn, known for its high wear resistance.

  • Flat-profile spring wire prevents rib impressions inside the bent pipe.

  • Spring with a diameter of 16mm and a length of 79cm.

  • Indispensable tool for hydraulic work in the PEX-AL-PEX and PERT-AL-PERT pipe systems.

  • One end of the spring features an eyelet for easy extraction from longer pipes.


Technical Specifications:



  • Material: Manganese spring steel alloy 65Mn, galvanized.

  • Diameter: 16 mm

  • Length: 79 cm

description.name: HSS twist drill for metal with cobalt 1 mm
description.long_desc:
Metal drill bit made of HSS M35 high speed steel with the addition of 5% cobalt. Drills according to DIN 338. Cylindrical handle.


The cobalt alloy guarantees high thermal resistance and thus increases wear resistance. A perfectly ground edge guarantees even faster and more precise drilling. The ground spiral ensures high accuracy and rapid removal of the spoil. The tip is ground in two stages at an angle of 125 °, which allows drilling without pre-marking.


Product features:



  • drill made of high-speed steel HHS-CO M35

  • The 5% cobalt content significantly increases the thermal resistance

  • very good removal of the spoil thanks to the ground spiral

  • 2-step tip ground at an angle of 125 °

  • perfectly ground cutting edge


 


Technical Specifications:


Steel: HSS-CO M35


Cobalt content: 5%


Size: 1.0mm


Point: 2-stage, ground at an angle of 125 °

description.name: HSS twist drill for metal with cobalt 2,5 mm
description.long_desc:
Metal drill bit made of HSS M35 high speed steel with the addition of 5% cobalt. Drills according to DIN 338. Cylindrical handle.


The cobalt alloy guarantees high thermal resistance and thus increases wear resistance. A perfectly ground edge guarantees even faster and more precise drilling. The ground spiral ensures high accuracy and rapid removal of the spoil. The tip is ground in two stages at an angle of 125 °, which allows drilling without pre-marking.


Product features:



  • drill made of high-speed steel HHS-CO M35

  • The 5% cobalt content significantly increases the thermal resistance

  • very good removal of the spoil thanks to the ground spiral

  • 2-step tip ground at an angle of 125 °

  • perfectly ground cutting edge


 


Technical Specifications:


Steel: HSS-CO M35


Cobalt content: 5%


Size: 2.5mm


Point: 2-stage, ground at an angle of 125 °

Size: 8.0mm


Point: 2-stage, ground at an angle of 125 °
description.short_desc:
Metal drill bit made of HSS M35 high speed steel with the addition of 5% cobalt. Drills according to DIN 338. Cylindrical handle.


The cobalt alloy guarantees high thermal resistance and thus increases wear resistance. A perfectly ground edge guarantees even faster and more precise drilling. The ground spiral ensures high accuracy and rapid removal of the spoil. The tip is ground in two stages at an angle of 125 °, which allows drilling without pre-marking.


Product features:



  • drill made of high-speed steel HHS-CO M35

  • The 5% cobalt content significantly increases the thermal resistance

  • very good removal of the spoil thanks to the ground spiral

  • 2-step tip ground at an angle of 125 °

  • perfectly ground cutting edge
